data.title: Ranger School

data.text:
Monday 12th August – Venison Campfire Cooking

£38 per child

Step into the world of wildlife and embark on a ‘Hands-On’ adventure with our beloved deer! Join our team of Rangers for an unforgettable half-day experience during the summer edition of Ranger School.

With two sessions daily (09:30 – 12:30 and 13:30 – 16:30), this adventure is tailored for children aged 5 to 12 years. Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity to connect with nature and deepen your understanding of our majestic deer population. Book your spot now and prepare for an exciting day filled with wildlife wonders!

What to wear

We do advise long trousers/leggings for the wooded area and the paddock as there are long grasses/nettles/brambles.

Wellies are a MUST

Double-check that all footwear still fits and that wellies are watertight

Bring a water-proof coat

Please note, that filming for future marketing and events will be taking place. Please let a member of staff know on arrival if you do not wish to feature in our marketing materials.

This event is not included in your General Entry ticket or Membership.
